original_title: New Indian High Commissioner presents credentials to President
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The new Indian High Commissioner to Sri Lanka Santosh Jha has presented credentials to President Ranil Wickremesinghe at the President's office this morning.
Santosh Jha will take the place of Gopal Baglay who is to be posted to Canberra, Australia.
Gopal Baglay relinquished charge as India’s Head of Mission to Sri Lanka on 15 December 2023.
